section.title: Increment 4

formalpara.title: Iteration 1, Test 2
formalpara.para: Trivial lack of return value on signal.

formalpara.title: Iteration 2, Test 2
formalpara.para: Incorrect use of ⊃ on a matrix. STUPID!

formalpara.title: Iteration 3, Test 2
formalpara.para: The ParseFunc is not returning three values in the first line.

formalpara.title: Iteration 4, Test 2
formalpara.para: The ParseFuncExpr is not returning four values in the first line.

formalpara.title: Iteration 5, Test 2
formalpara.para: The Parse function unexpectedly returns a syntax error.

formalpara.title: Iteration 6, Test 4
formalpara.para: Incorrect use of ⊃ on a matrix. STUPID!

formalpara.title: Iteration 7, Test 4
formalpara.para: In the call to ParseNamedBnd in ParseLineVar[62], the call returns with a syntax error. Here are some important data elements:

section.programlisting: ParseLineVar[62] (2 3 4∨.=Tp)∨(0=Tp)∧(SC=1):0,Vn Tp E ParseNamedBnd 2↓⍵ ∧ ⍵ 2 Variable name V4 2 Token name ← class separator 2 Function class ambivalent 3 Line 2↓⍵ 2 Function class ambivalent 3 Line

formalpara.title: Iteration 8, Test 5
formalpara.para: The LLVM IR produced by test 5 contains an empty function body for V1 when it should have returned the last value.

formalpara.title: Iteration 9, Test 8
formalpara.para: When dealing with an empty namespace, there is an INDEX ERROR in DropUnreached[9].

formalpara.title: Iteration 10, Test 9
formalpara.para: When dealing with an empty namespace, there is an INDEX ERROR in DropUnreached[9].
